00009 !===============================================================================
00010 ! READ_INPUT reads the CMFD input file and organizes it into a data structure
00011 !===============================================================================
00012 
00013   subroutine read_input()
00014 
00015     use global, only: cmfd
00016     use xml_data_cmfd_t
00017 
00018     ! local variables
00019     integer :: nx                    ! number of volumes in x-direction
00020     integer :: ny                    ! number of volumes in y-direction
00021     integer :: nz                    ! number of volumes in z-direction
00022     integer :: ng                    ! number of energy groups
00023     integer :: nnx                   ! number of sub meshes in x-direction
00024     integer :: nny                   ! number of sub meshes in y-direction
00025     integer :: nnz                   ! number of sub meshes in z-direction
00026     integer :: i                     ! x iteration counter
00027     integer :: j                     ! y iteration counter
00028     integer :: k                     ! z iteration counter
00029     integer :: g                     ! group iteration counter
00030     integer :: h                     ! group iteration counter
00031     integer :: map_idx               ! vector location for core map
00032     integer :: matid                 ! material id number
00033     integer :: hg_idx                ! energy h-->g vector location 
00034     integer :: dim_idx               ! vector location for dimensions
00035     integer :: ii                    ! inner loop x iteration
00036     integer :: jj                    ! inner loop y iteration
00037     integer :: kk                    ! inner loop z iteration
00038     integer :: ix                    ! shifted x index
00039     integer :: jy                    ! shifted y index
00040     integer :: kz                    ! shifted z index
00041     integer, allocatable :: xgrid(:) ! grid in the x direction
00042     integer, allocatable :: ygrid(:) ! grid in the y direction
00043     integer, allocatable :: zgrid(:) ! grid in the z direciton
00044 
00045     ! read xml input file
00046     call read_xml_file_cmfd_t('cmfd.xml')
00047 
00048     ! get mesh and group indices
00049     nnx = geometry%nx
00050     nny = geometry%ny
00051     nnz = geometry%nz
00052     ng = geometry%ng
00053 
00054     ! allocate grid varibles
00055     allocate(xgrid(nnx))
00056     allocate(ygrid(nny))
00057     allocate(zgrid(nnz))
00058 
00059     ! get grid variables
00060     xgrid = geometry%xgrid
00061     ygrid = geometry%ygrid
00062     zgrid = geometry%zgrid
00063 
00064     ! get total in each direction
00065     nx = sum(xgrid)
00066     ny = sum(ygrid)
00067     nz = sum(zgrid)
00068 
00069     ! allocate cmfd object
00070     allocate(cmfd%totalxs(ng,nx,ny,nz))
00071     allocate(cmfd%scattxs(ng,ng,nx,ny,nz))
00072     allocate(cmfd%nfissxs(ng,ng,nx,ny,nz))
00073     allocate(cmfd%diffcof(ng,nx,ny,nz))
00074     allocate(cmfd%dtilde(6,ng,nx,ny,nz))
00075     allocate(cmfd%hxyz(3,nx,ny,nz))
00076     allocate(cmfd%coremap(nx,ny,nz))
00077 
00078     ! record indices in object
00079     cmfd%indices(1) = nx
00080     cmfd%indices(2) = ny
00081     cmfd%indices(3) = nz
00082     cmfd%indices(4) = ng
00083 
00084     ! set boundary conditions
00085     cmfd%albedo = geometry%bc
00086 
00087     ! check core map dimensions
00088     if (size(geometry%mesh,1) /= nnx*nny*nnz) then
00089 
00090       ! write out fatal error
00091       print *,'FATAL ===> core map dimensions not consistent'
00092       STOP
00093 
00094     end if
00095 
00096     ! read in core map and xs
00097     ZLOOP:  do k = 1,nnz
00098 
00099       YLOOP: do j = 1,nny
00100 
00101         XLOOP: do i = 1,nnx
00102 
00103           GROUP: do g = 1,ng
00104 
00105             ! get vector idx for core map
00106             map_idx = get_matrix_idx(1,i,j,k,1,nnx,nny)
00107 
00108             ! extract material identifier
00109             matid = geometry%mesh(map_idx)
00110 
00111             ! record to core map
00112             ZZLOOP: do kk = 1,zgrid(k)
00113 
00114               YYLOOP: do jj = 1,ygrid(j)
00115 
00116                 XXLOOP: do ii = 1,xgrid(i)
00117 
00118                   ! compute shifted indices
00119                   ix = sum(xgrid(1:i)) - xgrid(i) + ii
00120                   jy = sum(ygrid(1:j)) - ygrid(j) + jj
00121                   kz = sum(zgrid(1:k)) - zgrid(k) + kk
00122 
00123                   ! record in object
00124                   cmfd%coremap(ix,jy,kz) = matid
00125 
00126                   ! check to see if matid is there
00127                   if (matid > size(mat,1)) then
00128 
00129                     ! write out fatal error
00130                     print *, 'Fatal Error ===> MATERIAL ID',matid,' NOT SET!'
00131                     STOP
00132 
00133                   end if
00134 
00135                   ! check if remxs is set
00136                   if (associated(mat(matid)%remxs)) then
00137 
00138                     ! set arbitrary totalxs
00139                     cmfd%totalxs(g,ix,jy,kz) = 0.5
00140 
00141                   else
00142 
00143                     ! set tot xs since it is given
00144                     cmfd%totalxs(g,ix,jy,kz) = mat(matid)%totalxs(g)
00145 
00146                   end if
00147 
00148                   ! set diffusion coefficient
00149                   cmfd%diffcof(g,ix,jy,kz) = mat(matid)%diffcoef(g)
00150 
00151                   ! loop around outgoing energy groups 
00152                   ELOOP: do h = 1,ng
00153 
00154                     ! get vector h-->g index
00155                     ! two group --> 1-->1,1-->2,2-->1,2-->2
00156                     hg_idx = g + ng*(h - 1)
00157 
00158                     ! check if remxs is set and if so adjust within group
00159                     if (associated(mat(matid)%remxs) .and. g == h) then
00160 
00161                       ! set within group scattering
00162                       cmfd%scattxs(h,g,ix,jy,kz) = cmfd%totalxs(g,ix,jy,kz) -  &
00163                      &                           mat(matid)%remxs(g)
00164 
00165                     else
00166 
00167                       ! set regular of just off-scattering
00168                       cmfd%scattxs(h,g,ix,jy,kz) = mat(matid)%scattxs(hg_idx)
00169 
00170                     end if
00171 
00172                     ! check if chi was entered
00173                     if (associated(mat(matid)%chi)) then
00174 
00175                       ! set nfissxs transfer based on chi and nfissxs vector
00176                       cmfd%nfissxs(h,g,ix,jy,kz) = mat(matid)%chi(g)*mat(matid)%nfissxs(h)
00177 
00178                     else
00179 
00180                       ! user entered in transfer matrix just record
00181                       cmfd%nfissxs(h,g,ix,jy,kz) = mat(matid)%nfissxs(hg_idx)
00182 
00183                     end if
00184 
00185                   end do ELOOP
00186 
00187                 end do XXLOOP
00188 
00189               end do YYLOOP
00190 
00191             end do ZZLOOP
00192 
00193           end do GROUP
00194 
00195         end do XLOOP
00196 
00197       end do YLOOP
00198 
00199     end do ZLOOP
00200 
00201     ! get dimensions
00202     if (associated(geometry%uniform)) then
00203 
00204       ! record uniform dimensions
00205       cmfd%hxyz(1,:,:,:) = geometry%uniform(1)
00206       cmfd%hxyz(2,:,:,:) = geometry%uniform(2)
00207       cmfd%hxyz(3,:,:,:) = geometry%uniform(3)
00208 
00209     else if (associated(geometry%dx)) then
00210 
00211       ! loop through to get nonuniform dimensions
00212       ZLOOP2: do k = 1,nnz
00213 
00214         YLOOP2: do j = 1,nny
00215 
00216           XLOOP2: do i = 1,nnx
00217 
00218             ! record to core map
00219             ZZLOOP2: do kk = 1,zgrid(k)
00220 
00221               YYLOOP2: do jj = 1,ygrid(j)
00222 
00223                 XXLOOP2: do ii = 1,xgrid(i)
00224 
00225                   ! compute shifted indices
00226                   ix = sum(xgrid(1:i)) - xgrid(i) + ii
00227                   jy = sum(ygrid(1:j)) - ygrid(j) + jj
00228                   kz = sum(zgrid(1:k)) - zgrid(k) + kk
00229 
00230                   ! record dimension
00231                   cmfd%hxyz(1,ix,jy,kz) = geometry%dx(i)/xgrid(i)
00232                   cmfd%hxyz(2,ix,jy,kz) = geometry%dy(j)/ygrid(j)
00233                   cmfd%hxyz(3,ix,jy,kz) = geometry%dz(k)/zgrid(k)
00234 
00235                 end do XXLOOP2
00236 
00237               end do YYLOOP2
00238 
00239             end do ZZLOOP2
00240 
00241           end do XLOOP2
00242 
00243         end do YLOOP2
00244 
00245       end do ZLOOP2
00246 
00247     else
00248 
00249       ! user forgot dimensions
00250       print *,'Fatal Error ===> Dimensions not entered correctly!'
00251       STOP
00252 
00253     end if
00254 
00255     ! write out core map and deallocate
00256     write(200,*) cmfd%coremap
00257     deallocate(cmfd%coremap)
00258 
00259     ! echo input
00260 !   print *, 'Dimensions:'
00261 !   print *,cmfd%indices
00262 !   print *, 'CORE MAP:'
00263 !   print *,cmfd%coremap
00264 !   print *, 'TOTAL XS:'
00265 !   print *,minval(cmfd%totalxs),maxval(cmfd%totalxs)
00266 !   print *, 'SCATTERING XS:'
00267 !   print *,minval(cmfd%scattxs),maxval(cmfd%scattxs)
00268 !   print *, 'Nu-FISSION XS:'
00269 !   print *,minval(cmfd%nfissxs),maxval(cmfd%nfissxs)
00270 !   print *, 'DIFFUSION COEFFICIENT:'
00271 !   print *,minval(cmfd%diffcof),maxval(cmfd%diffcof)
00272 !   print *, 'BOUNDARY CONDITIONS:'
00273 !   print *,cmfd%albedo
00274 !   print *, 'CORE CELL DIMENSIONS X:'
00275 !   print *,cmfd%hxyz(1,:,:,:)
00276 !   print *, 'CORE CELL DIMENSIONS Y:'
00277 !   print *,cmfd%hxyz(2,:,:,:)
00278 !   print *, 'CORE CELL DIMENSIONS Z:'
00279 !   print *,cmfd%hxyz(3,:,:,:)
00280 
00281   end subroutine read_input
00282 
00283 !===============================================================================
00284 ! GET_MATRIX_IDX takes (x,y,z,g) indices and computes location in matrix 
00285 !===============================================================================
00286 
00287   function get_matrix_idx(g,i,j,k,ng,nx,ny)
00288 
00289     ! arguments
00290     integer :: get_matrix_idx  ! the index location in matrix
00291     integer :: i               ! current x index
00292     integer :: j               ! current y index
00293     integer :: k               ! current z index
00294     integer :: g               ! current group index
00295     integer :: ng              ! max energy groups
00296     integer :: nx              ! maximum cells in x direction
00297     integer :: ny              ! maximum cells in y direction
00298 
00299     ! local variables
00300     integer :: nidx            ! index in matrix
00301 
00302     ! compute index
00303     nidx = g + ng*(i - 1) + ng*nx*(j - 1) + ng*nx*ny*(k - 1)
00304 
00305     ! record value to function
00306     get_matrix_idx = nidx
00307 
00308   end function get_matrix_idx
00309 
00310 end module cmfd_input
